name: PushableBox
shortDescription: Makes an object a pushable box.
description: You can install the new reworked version by searching the name:
Extension to make object work as a pushable box
Requires: Platformer character behavior, Platformer behavior
- Player can push and move the object.
- Player can stand on the object.
- User can set the "weight" of the box.
- User can set the moving keys of the object.
- User have the option to go through box or not.
- User can use up to 3 boxes.
- You can change the box (acceleration & deceleration) from the platformer character behavior.
- Extension action can be used ONCE only.

eventsFunctions.description: Make any object a pushable box.
eventsFunctions.name: PushableBox1Object

events.comment:
-Variable to store the player speed
-Take jump ability from the box object
-Set the box object to jumpthrough platform
-Take the movment control from the box object
Move the box right when the player move right taking into account both the player and the box speed
If the entered weight is higher than the player maximum speed > set the box and the player weight to player maximum speed
If the entered weight is lower than the player maximum speed > set the box and the player weight to the entered value
Move the box left when the player move left taking into account both the player and the box speed
If the entered weight is higher than the player maximum speed > set the box and the player weight to player maximum speed
If the entered weight is lower than the player maximum speed > set the box and the player weight to the entered value

parameters.longDescription:
The higher the value the lighter the box, 
Maximum box speed = player maximum speed
parameters.name: Weight

parameters.description: Player can go through the box ?
parameters.longDescription: When the box is stuck (not moving).
parameters.name: GoThroughBox
